Package ch.zhaw.it.pm3.spacerunner.domain.spaceelement.velocity

Class VelocityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.it.pm3.spacerunner.domain.spaceelement.velocity.VelocityManager
  • public class VelocityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Manager for the Velocity of the different SpaceElements. It is implemented with the singleton-pattern. The Manager was implemented because for example all Asteroids share the same velocity. => So it would make no sense to have the velocity in every element itself. The Velocity is set per Class of SpaceElement (? extends SpaceElement)

    • Method Detail

      • getManager

        public static VelocityManager getManager()

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear the velocity map in the manager. (Reset)

      • setupGameElementVelocity

        public void setupGameElementVelocity()
        Setup velocities for the game elements. If a new element is implemented, add code for the element in this function so it has a velocity at the start.

      • setRelativeVelocity

        public void setRelativeVelocity​(java.lang.Class<? extends SpaceElement> elementClass,
                                java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double velocity)
        Set the velocity for a Class <? extends SpaceElement>. The velocity is given as a point. x is the x velocity and y is the y velocity.
        Parameters:
        elementClass - Class <? extends SpaceElement> to set the velocity
        velocity - Point2D.Double velocity to be set

      • accelerateAll

        public void accelerateAll​(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double acceleration)
        Accelerates all the element classes which are currently managed.
        Parameters:
        acceleration - Point2D.Double acceleration. Accelerate all x-velocities with acceleration.x and all y-velocities with acceleration.y

      • accelerateX

        public void accelerateX​(java.lang.Class<? extends SpaceElement> elementClass,
                        double accelerationX)
        Accelerates the x velocity of a specific class. If the class is not currently managed, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        elementClass - Class <? extends SpaceElement> to accelerate
        accelerationX - acceleration for x-velocity

      • accelerateY

        public void accelerateY​(java.lang.Class<? extends SpaceElement> elementClass,
                        double accelerationY)
        Accelerates the y velocity of a specific class. If the class is not currently managed, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        elementClass - Class <? extends SpaceElement> to accelerate
        accelerationY - acceleration for y-velocity

      • accelerate

        public void accelerate​(java.lang.Class<? extends SpaceElement> elementClass,
                       java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double acceleration)
        Accelerates velocity of a specific class.
        Parameters:
        elementClass - Class <? extends SpaceElement> to accelerate
        acceleration - Point2D.Double acceleration. Accelerate x-velocity with acceleration.x and y-velocity with acceleration.y

      • getRelativeVelocity

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getRelativeVelocity​(java.lang.Class<? extends SpaceElement> elementClass)
                                                 throws VelocityNotSetException
        Get the velocity of a specific class.
        Parameters:
        elementClass - Class <? extends SpaceElement> to get the velocity of
        Returns:
        velocity of the class
        Throws:
        VelocityNotSetException - if the velocity was not set
